comment: Submitted for your alpha test of the app.  Can't wait to try it out!  My wife doesn't like to sit down at the desktop, so our budget isn't keeping up with reality as much as it should.  The app will be a great help.  We are also from the YNAB Exodus.  Been using Buckets for a few months now, and I bought a license after reading abouy your loaves initiative.  May God be glorified!  Where your treasure is, there your heart will be also.
name: Aaron
